alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 12:23PM CDT until May 11 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 1222 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wisner to Sicily Island to Manifest, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Cooter Point around 1230 PM CDT. Ferriday, St. Joseph and Clayton around 100 PM CDT. Alcorn State and Spokane around 110 PM CDT. Natchez and Vidalia around 115 PM CDT. Fayette and Lorman around 125 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
